attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the greeks have been totally pining for a war with the UK- behaving arrogantly, being disruptive in the EU... the list goes on. I suggest that Gordon Brown declares war on Greece to show them the consequences of messing with the UK.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
